DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Blood Culture Procedure Positive Review Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the evaluation of a laboratory procedure confirming the presence of a disease by growing microorganisms.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic Blood Culture Procedure Positive Review
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the evaluation of a laboratory procedure confirming the presence of a disease by growing microorganisms.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristic or indicative of (e.g., a disease).:A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.:Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.

Concepts.definition: Characteristic or indicative of a condition.

A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.

Property.preferredDefinition: An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.:The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

Concepts.definition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
